oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dear Elvis Presley Fan Clubs Card
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Presley, Elvis, 1935-1977;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color card (blue on white) containing a letter from Hatch to Elvis Presley Fan Clubs and Fan Club Members offering a two color replica of the original letterpress show poster ordered for Elvis Presley's show in Jacksonville, Florida, on August 10 and 11, 1956. Card includes pricing and size information.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:medium: cards (information artifacts); letters (correspondence); proofs (prints by function);
